name: pagequery
title: PageQuery
description: Execute jQuery/JavaScript and show results from a web page.
author: Krishnaprasad MG <sunspikes@gmail.com>

preferences.name: extensions.pageQuery.pqUrl
preferences.title: URL
preferences.description:
The web page URL on which the the jQuery/JavaScript will be executed.
 Example:
 https://news.ycombinator.com

preferences.name: extensions.pageQuery.pqCode
preferences.title: Code
preferences.description:
The jQuery/JavaScript one liner to be executed.
 Example (shows first HN Link):
 $('table tr:nth-child(3) table tr:first-child td:nth-child(3) a').attr('href')
